QuestData.Title: Veilwing Soul
QuestData.Description:
<Graceful, dangerous, powerful. No creature in Ardenweald is more respected for its fierce defense of its family or territory than the veilwing.
You have defeated a foe who endangered not only Ardenweald, but all of the Shadowlands. For this, Champion of Ardenweald, you have earned a special boon - the ability to call upon the essence of the veilwing and take their shape.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Veilwing Soul to Lady Muunn in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Veilwing Soul to Lady Muunn in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: You have shown rare bravery, $n. For this the forest recognizes you. Let all know your ferocity in defending our borders, and the love you have for our charges.
